item.title: The best (and worst) housing markets for retirees in 2026
item.description: Discover the best and worst retirement housing markets for 6.5 million Americans retiring in 2026. Midwest cities dominate while California struggles.

item.title: Hilton cuts ties with Minnesota hotel owner after DHS, ICE agents allegedly denied service
item.description: Hilton terminates franchise with Minneapolis hotel after video appeared to confirm property was refusing to accommodate ICE agents despite apology.

item.title: Hilton distances itself from Minneapolis hotel after ICE agents denied rooms

item.title: AT&T plans to build new headquarters outside of Dallas
item.description: AT&T announced plans to relocate its Dallas headquarters to Plano by 2028, moving about 6,000 employees to a new campus to be built on a 54-acre site.
